creator: Aisha Malik
title: YouTube will soon let creators make Shorts with their own AI likeness
dc:creator: Aisha Malik
content: YouTube Shorts viewers might soon see AI versions of their favorite creators when scrolling through their feeds.
contentSnippet: YouTube Shorts viewers might soon see AI versions of their favorite creators when scrolling through their feeds.

creator: Ivan Mehta
title: OpenAI aims to ship its first device in 2026, and it could be earbuds
dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
content: The AI startup is on track to announce its first hardware device in the second half of this year, OpenAI Chief Global Affairs Officer Chris Lehane said during an interview at Davos.
contentSnippet: The AI startup is on track to announce its first hardware device in the second half of this year, OpenAI Chief Global Affairs Officer Chris Lehane said during an interview at Davos.

creator: TechCrunch Events
title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 tickets now on sale: Lowest rates all year
dc:creator: TechCrunch Events
content: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 tickets are officially on sale. Save up to $680 on your ticket and be among the first 500 registrants to score a plus-one pass at 50% off. Don't miss 10,000 tech leaders, founders, and VCs in San Francisco from October 13-15. Register before these one-time deals vanish.
contentSnippet: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 tickets are officially on sale. Save up to $680 on your ticket and be among the first 500 registrants to score a plus-one pass at 50% off. Don't miss 10,000 tech leaders, founders, and VCs in San Francisco from October 13-15. Register before these one-time deals vanish.

creator: Ivan Mehta
title: Adobe Acrobat now lets you edit files using prompts, generate podcast summaries
dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
content: Adobe is adding AI tools to Acrobat, including the ability to generate podcast summaries of files, create presentations, and a way for users to edit files using prompts.
contentSnippet: Adobe is adding AI tools to Acrobat, including the ability to generate podcast summaries of files, create presentations, and a way for users to edit files using prompts.

creator: Tim De Chant
title: Zanskar thinks 1 TW of geothermal power is being overlooked
dc:creator: Tim De Chant
content: Zanskar has raised $115 million to find about a dozen geothermal resources that could help power the grid throughout the U.S. West.
contentSnippet: Zanskar has raised $115 million to find about a dozen geothermal resources that could help power the grid throughout the U.S. West.

creator: Anna Heim
title: Language learning marketplace Preply’s unicorn status embodies Ukrainian resilience
dc:creator: Anna Heim
content: Language learning marketplace Preply is now valued at $1.2 billion after raising a $150 million that marks a new chapter for the 14-year-old company.
contentSnippet: Language learning marketplace Preply is now valued at $1.2 billion after raising a $150 million that marks a new chapter for the 14-year-old company.

creator: Sarah Perez
title: Consumers spent more on mobile apps than games in 2025, driven by AI app adoption
dc:creator: Sarah Perez
content: Consumers spent more money in mobile apps than games in 2025, driven by AI app adoption.
contentSnippet: Consumers spent more money in mobile apps than games in 2025, driven by AI app adoption.

creator: Ivan Mehta
title: Bolna nabs $6.3M from General Catalyst for its India-focused voice orchestration platform
dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
content: Bolna said that 75% of its revenue is coming from self-serve customers.
contentSnippet: Bolna said that 75% of its revenue is coming from self-serve customers.

creator: Connie Loizos
title: Anthropic’s CEO stuns Davos with Nvidia criticism
dc:creator: Connie Loizos
content: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei unloaded on both the administration and U.S. chip companies over plans to sell to China. The criticism was particularly notable because one of those chipmakers, Nvidia, is a major partner and investor in Anthropic.
contentSnippet: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei unloaded on both the administration and U.S. chip companies over plans to sell to China. The criticism was particularly notable because one of those chipmakers, Nvidia, is a major partner and investor in Anthropic.

creator: Lucas Ropek
title: In an effort to protect young users, ChatGPT will now predict how old you are
dc:creator: Lucas Ropek
content: The feature is designed to stop problematic content from being delivered to users under the age of 18.
contentSnippet: The feature is designed to stop problematic content from being delivered to users under the age of 18.

creator: Rebecca Bellan
title: Elon Musk says Tesla’s restarted Dojo3 will be for ‘space-based AI compute’
dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
content: Tesla aims to restart work on Dojo3, its previously abandoned third-generation AI chip. Only this time, Dojo3 won’t be aimed at training self-driving models on Earth. Instead, Musk says it will be dedicated to “space-based AI compute.”
contentSnippet: Tesla aims to restart work on Dojo3, its previously abandoned third-generation AI chip. Only this time, Dojo3 won’t be aimed at training self-driving models on Earth. Instead, Musk says it will be dedicated to “space-based AI compute.”

creator: Rebecca Bellan
title: Humans&, a ‘human-centric’ AI startup founded by Anthropic, xAI, Google alums, raised $480M seed round
dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
content: Humans&, a startup that believes AI should empower people, not replace them, has reportedly raised a $480 million seed round at a $4.48 billion valuation.
contentSnippet: Humans&, a startup that believes AI should empower people, not replace them, has reportedly raised a $480 million seed round at a $4.48 billion valuation.

creator: Jagmeet Singh
title: Indian vibe-coding startup Emergent triples valuation to $300M with $70M fundraise
dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
content: The funding comes as the startup claims it has scaled ARR to $50 million and is targeting $100 million by April 2026.
contentSnippet: The funding comes as the startup claims it has scaled ARR to $50 million and is targeting $100 million by April 2026.

creator: Rebecca Szkutak
title: Here are the 55 US AI startups that raised $100M or more in 2025
dc:creator: Rebecca Szkutak
content: Last year was monumental for the AI industry in the U.S. and beyond. How will 2025 compare?
contentSnippet: Last year was monumental for the AI industry in the U.S. and beyond. How will 2025 compare?

creator: Sarah Perez
title: Well, there goes the metaverse!
dc:creator: Sarah Perez
content: The metaverse is on its last legs as VR is eclipsed by AI. But that's not the only thing that went wrong for Meta's VR ambitions.
contentSnippet: The metaverse is on its last legs as VR is eclipsed by AI. But that's not the only thing that went wrong for Meta's VR ambitions.

creator: Rebecca Bellan
title: Rogue agents and shadow AI: Why VCs are betting big on AI security
dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
content: Misaligned agents are just one layer of the AI security challenge that startup Witness AI is trying to solve. It detects employee use of unapproved tools, blocks attacks, and ensures compliance.
contentSnippet: Misaligned agents are just one layer of the AI security challenge that startup Witness AI is trying to solve. It detects employee use of unapproved tools, blocks attacks, and ensures compliance.

creator: Connie Loizos
title: Sequoia to invest in Anthropic, breaking VC taboo on backing rivals: FT
dc:creator: Connie Loizos
content: Venture capital firms have historically avoided backing competing companies in the same sector, preferring to place their bets on a single winner. Yet here's Sequoia, already invested in both OpenAI and Elon Musk's xAI, now throwing its weight behind Anthropic, too.
contentSnippet: Venture capital firms have historically avoided backing competing companies in the same sector, preferring to place their bets on a single winner. Yet here's Sequoia, already invested in both OpenAI and Elon Musk's xAI, now throwing its weight behind Anthropic, too.

creator: Russell Brandom
title: Moxie Marlinspike has a privacy-conscious alternative to ChatGPT
dc:creator: Russell Brandom
content: Confer is designed to look and feel like ChatGPT or Claude, but your conversations can't be used for training or advertising.
contentSnippet: Confer is designed to look and feel like ChatGPT or Claude, but your conversations can't be used for training or advertising.

creator: Connie Loizos
title: Musk wants up to $134B in OpenAI lawsuit, despite $700B fortune
dc:creator: Connie Loizos
content: Musk's legal team argues he should be compensated as an early startup investor who sees returns "many orders of magnitude greater" than his initial investment.
contentSnippet: Musk's legal team argues he should be compensated as an early startup investor who sees returns "many orders of magnitude greater" than his initial investment.

creator: Julie Bort
title: AI cloud startup Runpod hits $120M in ARR — and it started with a Reddit post
dc:creator: Julie Bort
content: Their startup journey is a wild example of how if you build it well and the timing is lucky, they will definitely come.
contentSnippet: Their startup journey is a wild example of how if you build it well and the timing is lucky, they will definitely come.
